entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
